infoBanner.message: To add a schedule, create a normal transaction and check the "Schedule" option.

fab.label: New Transaction
fab.hint: Don't forget to enable the Recurring check

emptyState.title: No scheduled transactions
emptyState.subtitle: This is a consolidated view of your recurring payments. You currently have no active schedules.

howItWorks.title: How to create one?
howItWorks.description: Schedules are not created from here. You need to go to the New Transaction form and enable the "Schedule" switch.

emptyActive.title: No active schedules
emptyActive.message: Enable scheduling when creating a transaction

deactivate.title: Deactivate schedule
deactivate.message: This will deactivate the schedule for "{{name}}". No more transactions will be generated automatically.
deactivate.warning: This action is irreversible. If you want to activate it again, you will need to create a new schedule.
deactivate.note: Already recorded transactions will not be affected.
